mapper.select: SELECT S_CODE, B_CODE, ACC_NAME, ACC_BANK, ACC_NO, S_POSTCODE, S_ADDR, S_DETAIL, S_ENTDATE, S_CHK, S_OUT, S_OUT_DATE FROM SELLER
SELECT * FROM Prd WHERE CT_PNO = 0 ORDER BY PRD_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM Prd WHERE CT_PNO = 0 ORDER BY PRD_HIT DESC
SELECT ORIGIN_NAME FROM Prd_File WHERE PRD_CODE = #{prdCode} AND CT_PFLNO = 600
SELECT PF.ORIGIN_NAME FROM Prd_File PF WHERE PRD_CODE IN ( SELECT PRD_CODE FROM Prd WHERE CT_PNO = 0 ORDER BY PRD_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY ) AND PF.CT_PFLNO = 600
SELECT PF.ORIGIN_NAME FROM Prd_File PF WHERE PRD_CODE IN ( SELECT PRD_CODE FROM Prd WHERE CT_PNO = 0 ORDER BY PRD_HIT DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY ) AND PF.CT_PFLNO = 600
SELECT ORIGIN_NAME FROM Prd_File WHERE PRD_CODE = #{prdCode} AND CT_PFLNO = 600
SELECT ORIGIN_NAME FROM Prd_File WHERE PRD_CODE = #{prdCode} AND CT_PFLNO = 610
SELECT S.S_CODE, S.B_CODE, S.ACC_NAME, S.ACC_BANK, S.ACC_NO, S.S_POSTCODE, S.S_ADDR, S.S_DETAIL, S.S_ENTDATE, S.S_CHK, S.S_OUT, S.S_OUT_DATE FROM SELLER S WHERE S.S_CODE = #{sCode}

SELECT count(*) FROM order_detail OD, prd P
AND OD.prd_code = P.prd_code(+) AND P.s_code = #{sCode } AND OD.stt_no = 920
SELECT r.RCY_CODE, r.B_CODE, r.PRD_CODE, r.RCY_CMT, r.RCY_DATE, b.B_NAME FROM Rcy r LEFT JOIN Buyer b ON r.B_CODE = b.B_CODE WHERE r.PRD_CODE = #{prdCode}

SELECT B_Code AS bCode, B_Ct_Code AS bCtCode, B_Id AS bId, B_Pw AS bPw, B_Name AS bName, B_Phone AS bPhone, B_Email AS bEmail, Ad_Sms AS adSms, Ad_Email AS adEmail FROM Buyer
AND B_Id = #{bId }
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'RCY' || LPAD(RCY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 7, '0') AS rcyCode FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO Rcy (RCY_CODE, B_CODE, PRD_CODE, RCY_CMT, RCY_DATE) VALUES (#{rcyCode}, #{bCode}, #{prdCode}, #{rcyCmt}, SYSDATE)
